name: Purge Account
description: Removes patient account data from the financial system when accounts are no longer needed
hl7Reference: HL7 v2.3 Chapter 6 Financial Management - HL7.eu/HL7v2x/v23/std23
businessPurpose: Remove account data from financial systems for accounts that are no longer needed or have been fully resolved
timing: Sent when account data needs to be purged from the system, typically after account closure and resolution
standardNotes: P02 should only be used for complete account removal from financial systems
Use after account has been closed with P06 and all billing resolved
Consider data retention policies before purging account information
EVN.2 should contain the purge execution date/time
realWorldScenarios: Completed patient account with zero balance after final payment
Duplicate account created in error - purge after data consolidation
Deceased patient account closure after estate settlement
Research account closure after study completion and data archival
System cleanup removing old inactive accounts per retention policy
Account merger completion requiring old account purge

generationRules.PID: Patient identification for account being purged
generationRules.PV1: Visit information if account tied to specific encounter
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - account purging is irreversible and affects financial reporting and audit trails
